snippet.title: C to A Source Mod Teaser for HL2
snippet.description:
This is just a teaser movie that I made of "Coastline to Atmosphere" when it was in the early Beta stage of production. It's a new mod for HalfLife2 with 15 new Single player maps developed by Leon Brinkmann and myself. The entire project took little over a year to complete, but it is finally ready for all of you hardcore gamers to enjoy playing.
You can download the FULL mod from one of the following websites (You must own a copy of HalfLife2 for the mod to work);

http://www.sp-mods.com/home/php-files/downloads.php?cat_id=10

http://www.planetphillip.com/posts/leons-coastline-to-atmosphere-single-player-half-life-2-mod/

http://halflife2.filefront.com/file/HalfLife_2_Coastline_to_Atmosphere_Single_Player_Mod;67463

http://www.fileplanet.com/167065/160000/fileinfo/Half-Life-2---Coastline-to-Atmosphere-Mod

Enjoy!
